message: What do I need to do to rebuild SQLAlchemy when I've modified an object by adding a column?

there was a post recently on the mailing list about alternatives to sqlalchemy-migrate: http://flask.pocoo.org/mailinglist/archive/2011/5/30/flask-migrate-simple-migrations-for-sqlalchemy-and-flask/#3b36a9e464dfee433ddeb02a1b470935
if you are testing and don't care about your data, you can run db.drop_all() in the same manner that you run db.create_all()
